data.title: Penang Sentral
data.text:
Penang Sentral is a transportation hub located in Butterworth, Penang, Malaysia. It serves as a major transportation center for both domestic and international travel. Penang Sentral serves as a central hub for travelers, offering convenient connectivity and a range of transportation options. It plays a crucial role in facilitating travel within Penang and connecting the state to other parts of Malaysia.

The transportation facilities at Penang Sentral are modern and well-maintained. The railway station offers regular train services to various destinations in Malaysia, including Kuala Lumpur, Ipoh, and Singapore.

Shall you need further assistance, please contact Penang Sentral Contact Center as stated below:

Address Contact Open 5130

Terminal Pengangkutan Penang Sentral

Jalan Bagan Dalam

12100 Butterworth

Pulau Pinang

Malaysia

604 313 9888 9:00 am - 6:00 pm (Mon - Fri)
